short_summary: Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC177 Globemaster
description: This requirement is to acquire 1 item for the CC-177 Globemaster for the Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) DAP4.
full_summary:
=====


### Government Tender Announcement - Aviation Replacement Parts for CC177 Globemaster


#### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

The Department of National Defense (DND) invites interested qualified suppliers to submit a proposal to acquire aviation replacement parts for the CC177 Globemaster aircraft.


#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

*   Solicitation Number: W8485-247827/A
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   RFP Status: Closed
*   Expected Contract Start Date: October 26, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: November 9, 2023


#### Eligibility Requirements

The RFP is open to qualified suppliers who are holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series. Interested suppliers are advised to review the eligibility criteria and requirements detailed in the RFP document.


#### How to Submit a Proposal

Qualified suppliers will receive the RFP documents via email from the Contracting Authority. Inquiries regarding the RFP should be submitted to Brendan Vick, DAP 4-3-2, Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM), Department of National Defense (DND) / Government of Canada, 455 Boulvard de la Carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7, brendan.vick2@forces.gc.ca.


#### Notice of Ongoing Opportunity for Qualification

A Notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series. Interested suppliers should submit their request to Edmond Egikian, Supply Officer, Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada, Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector, Civilian Aircraft Division - CAG, via email at edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

Attachments: None.


#### Contracting Entity Information

*   Contracting Entity Name: Department of National Defense
*   Contracting Entity Address: 455 Boulvard de la Carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7, Canada
*   Contracting Entity Phone: (819) 939-4277
*   Contracting Entity Email: brendan.vick2@forces.gc.ca


#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Interested suppliers are advised to review the trade agreement requirements and terms.


#### Regions of Delivery
